focus: QUEEN.md template at runtime/templates/QUEEN.md.template has the target structure with promotion thresholds in embedded METADATA JSON — philosophy:5, pattern:3, redirect:2, stack:1, decree:0
build.md Step 4 loads constraints and Step 5.1 generates worker prompts — these are the injection points for queen-read wisdom

constraints.content: Do not create ~/.aether/eternal/ directory — keep wisdom in .aether/QUEEN.md in the repo, not global eternal directories
Do not add pheromone decay math or TTL calculations — the existing constraints system works, QUEEN.md promotion is the eternal layer
